    • legal

      public boolean legal(int r, int c, int nbr)
      Checks if a number can be placed on specified position according to the rules of Sudoku. Controlls that the placed number is within bounds
      Specified by:
      legal in interface SudokuSolver
      Returns:
      Looks for the same number in Row and column and false if same number as parameter is found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • setMatrix

      public void setMatrix(int[][] nbrs)
      Fills the grid with the digits in m. The digit 0 represents an empty box.
      Specified by:
      setMatrix in interface SudokuSolver
      Parameters:
      nbrs - the matrix with the digits to insert
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if nbrs has the wrong dimension or contains values outside the range [0..9]
